sentences.en: damage to both urban and rural environments
For urban areas this approach was wholly inadequate.
sentences.cn: 对于市区来说，这种办法根本不会奏效。

sentences.en: His parents are trying to make up to him for the restrictions of urban living.
sentences.cn: 他的父母正试图弥补他在城市生活的局限。

sentences.en: Industrialization inevitably led to the expansion of the urban working class.
sentences.cn: 工业化不可避免地导致了城市工人阶级人数的增多.

sentences.en: It seems reasonable to expect rapid urban growth.
sentences.cn: 似乎有理由期望城市快速发展。

sentences.en: Manchester still suffers from urban blight and unacceptable poverty.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特仍然受到城区脏乱和严重贫困问题的困扰。

sentences.en: Modern industry has been concentrated in a few urban centers.
sentences.cn: 现代工业全集中在几个市中心.

sentences.en: Most of the population is an urban population.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数人口都是城镇居民。

sentences.en: Most urban areas are close to a park.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数城区附近都有公园。

sentences.en: School crime and violence cuts across urban, rural and suburban areas.
sentences.cn: 城市、乡村和郊区都出现了校园犯罪和校园暴力现象。

sentences.en: She examines the interplay between changing gender divisions and urban change.
sentences.cn: 她研究性别差异的变化和城市变化之间的相互影响.

sentences.en: the deprived sections of the urban population
sentences.cn: 城市人口中的贫困群体

sentences.en: The spread of urban areas endangers wildlife.
sentences.cn: 扩大城市面积危害着野生物.

sentences.en: The whole urban sprawl of Ankara contains over 2.6m people.
sentences.cn: 安卡拉整个肆意扩展的城区容纳了260多万人口。

sentences.en: There are problems of urban decay and gang violence.
sentences.cn: 存在城市衰败和帮派暴力的问题。

sentences.en: Urban development has led to the ruination of vast areas of countryside.
sentences.cn: 城市发展导致大片的乡村遭到毁坏。

words.tran_cn: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的

phrases.tran_cn: 城市扩张；都市向郊区扩张的现象
城市交通运输；市区运输

trans.tran_cn: (Urban)人名；(西)乌尔万；(斯洛伐)乌尔班；(德、俄、罗、匈、塞、波、捷、瑞典、意)乌尔班；(英)厄本；(法)于尔邦
